sentence: Home Depot, Inc. ( HD ) will begin trading ex-dividend on November 29, 2017.
A cash dividend payment of $0.89 per share is scheduled to be paid on December 14, 2017.
Shareholders who purchased HD prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 4th quarter that HD has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $174.16, the dividend yield is 2.04%.
The previous trading day's last sale of HD was $174.16, representing a -0.43% decrease from the 52 week high of $174.91 and a 35.35% increase over the 52 week low of $128.68.
HD is a part of the Consumer Services sector, which includes companies such as Lowe's Companies, Inc. ( LOW ) and Sherwin-Williams Company ( SHW ).
HD's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $7.2.
Zacks Investment Research reports HD's forecasted earnings growth in 2018 as 14.29%, compared to an industry average of 5.6%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the HD Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
